title: Horizontal asymptote of a composite sine function

content.prompt:
The function f is given by f ( x ) = sin ( x + 1 x 2 ) . Which of the following statements are true?

I. The graph of f has a horizontal asymptote at y=0 .

II. The graph of f has a horizontal asymptote at y=1 .

III. The graph of f has a vertical asymptote at x=0 .

topic.text: 1.15: Connecting Limits at Infinity and Horizontal Asymptotes

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
